suppress.notes: This vulnerability is recorded as being present in versions "up to and including 20230618" file name: json-20240205.jar

This is a vulnerability in Prometheus itself, as installed on a server, not the metrics libraries. file name: prometheus-metrics-config-1.2.1.jar file name: prometheus-metrics-core-1.2.1.jar file name: prometheus-metrics-exposition-formats-1.2.1.jar file name: prometheus-metrics-model-1.2.1.jar file name: prometheus-metrics-shaded-protobuf-1.2.1.jar file name: prometheus-metrics-tracer-common-1.2.1.jar
